summary: FGJOGO Layout Refactoring - All features tested successfully. CTA moved below metrics, RED 'COMEÇAR AGORA' button, FGJOGO identity (FG white, JOGO red), Arcade Core with 3 orbiting icons, very slow ring rotations, scanline effect, providers centered grid, mobile responsive carousel.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Complete FGJOGO layout refactoring verified. Key changes from iteration 3: (1) Identity changed from 'VIVA IMPACT' header to 'FGJOGO' (FG white, JOGO red) in header, splash, footer; (2) CTA moved from hero section to BELOW metrics (after 200+ games card); (3) CTA button changed from blue 'ACESSAR PLATAFORMA' to RED 'COMEÇAR AGORA'; (4) Arcade Core now has 3 orbiting icons: golden coin (amber-400, 12s orbit), violet star (violet-400, 18s orbit), green mushroom (emerald-400, 25s orbit); (5) Concentric rings rotate VERY slowly (60s and 45s); (6) Scanline animation passes through core; (7) AI PREDICTION card has border glow animation; (8) Providers: 5-column centered grid desktop, 3-column tablet, horizontal carousel mobile; (9) Footer has 3 lines with FGJOGO branding.
mocked_api_note: AI Accuracy percentage (90-99.5%) is MOCKED - animated locally via JavaScript setInterval
